title: Ryan Fitzpatrick signs 1-year deal with the Washington Football Team, sources say
body: The Washington Football Team has reportedly agreed to a 1-year deal with Ryan Fitzpatrick that is worth $10 million, multiple sources report.  and  are both reporting details on the deal, including that it has a $12 million max. The former Dolphins quarterback is reportedly headed to training camp as the WFT's starter. Joe Theismann, Tim Murphy, and Shawne Merriman spoke to ABC7's Scott Abraham about the new development for the Washington Football Team.
